summary: WHILE DRIVING AND WITHOUT WARNING THE ELECTRICAL SYSTEM FAILED.  *NLM   ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS, THE BRAKE LIGHTS REMAINED ON AND/OR CAME ON BY THEMSELVES AFTER THE ENGINE WAS CUT OFF.  DEFECTIVE BRAKE LIGHT SWITCH ASSEMBLY HAD TO BE REPLACED.  CRUISE CONTROL WOULD NOT DEACTIVATE AT 76 MPH.     *TT  *JB
